Title: Ariel
Actors: Turo Pajala, Susanna Haavisto, Matti Pellonp‰‰, Eetu Hilkamo
Plot: The movie tells the story of Taisto Kasurinen, a finnish coal miner whose father has just committed suicide and who is framed for a crime he did not commit. In jail, he starts to dream about leaving the country and starting a new life. He escapes from prison but things don't go as planned...
